Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl

Class DefaultCMCCaApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl.AbstractCMCCaApi
      • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl.AbstractAdminCMCCaApi
        • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl.DefaultCMCCaApi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CMCCaApi
    public class DefaultCMCCaApi
extends AbstractAdminCMCCaApi
    Default CMC API implementation. This API implementation extends the AbstractAdminCMCCaApi providing default functionality for processing CMC requests. This implementation only provides the functionality for creating the Certificate issuing model data used as input for Certificate Issuance. Modifications of this class may implement other rules, checks or overrides to what extensions or certificate data that is accepted in issued certificates based on a CMC request.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
